name.baseName: cement milling;cement, modified granulated copper slag 31%, 42.9MPa;modified granulated copper slag
水泥研磨;水泥, 改性粒状铜渣 31%, 42.9MPa;改性粒状铜渣

dataSetInformation.common:generalComment: Blended Cement Production. Modified granulated copper slag (MGCS) is utilized as an supplementary cementitious material (SCM) (30 wt.%). The clinker that formed in the kiln was cooled down using air quenching devices, where additional heat was recovered into the pre-heater and cyclone separators. The clinker was subsequently blended with gypsum to form a mixture that was ground with about 30 wt.% of modified granulated copper slag (MGCS) at the cement mill. Finally, a fine grey powder was obtained from the cement mill, and then placed in silos.MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form granulated copper slag (GCS) with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.

混合水泥生产。改性粒状铜渣被用作辅助胶凝材料（30 wt.%）。在窑炉中形成的熟料通过空气淬火装置冷却，其中额外的热量被回收到预热器和旋风分离器中。然后将熟料与石膏混合，在水泥磨中与约30wt％的改性粒状铜渣（Modified granulated copper slag，MGCS）一起研磨。最后，从水泥磨中得到细灰色粉末，然后放置在筒仓中。MGCS的制备是一个关键的阶段。原始的铜渣采自瑞典斯德哥尔摩的Boliden Mineral AB冶炼厂。将其在生料磨中研磨，以形成粒径小于0.60毫米的粒状铜渣（Granulated copper slag，GCS）。CaO（纯度99.9％）由中国长沙大诺建材有限公司提供。MGCS制备过程如下：在炉中加入GCS和CaO（20wt％），加热温度升至约1550℃，此时混合物完全熔化。然后采用水淬法形成MGCS。整个过程在150mL/min的氮气中进行。该过程在中国长沙矿冶研究院有限公司进行。生产的MGCS最终由卡车运输到水泥厂，该厂以电能为主要能源。

locationOfOperationSupplyOrProduction.descriptionOfRestrictions: A typical cement plant in Changsha, Hunan Province, China
湖南省长沙市内某典型水泥厂

technology.technologyDescriptionAndIncludedProcesse: MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten [23]. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min [24]. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.

MGCS preparation is a crucial phase. The original copper slag was procured from a smelter of Boliden Mineral AB, Stockholm, Sweden. This was ground in the raw mill to form GCS with a particle size lower than 0.60 mm. The CaO (99.9% pure) was supplied by Changsha Danuo Building Materials Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The procedure of MGCS production is as follows. The GCS and CaO (20 wt.%) were charged in the furnace while the heating temperature was raised to approximately 1550 ◦C, at which point the mixtures were completely molten [23]. The water-quenching method was then adopted to form the MGCS. The entire process was carried out within a nitrogen atmosphere with a flow rate of 150 mL/min [24]. This procedure was conducted in the Changsha Research Institute of Mining and Metallurgy Co., Ltd., Changsha, China. The produced MGCS was eventually transported by trucks to the cement plant, which uses electricity as the main energy source.
technology.technologicalApplicability: The described process is involved in the production of blended cement using Modified Granulated Copper Slag (MGCS) as a supplementary cementitious material (SCM). MGCS constitutes approximately 30% by weight of the final cement product and is used to enhance the compressive strength of the cement, which achieves a performance characteristic of 42.9 MPa. This specialized cement blend is likely used in construction applications where higher compressive strength and durability are required.
所述工艺涉及使用改性粒状铜渣（MGCS）作为辅助胶凝材料（SCM）生产混合水泥。MGCS约占最终水泥产品重量的30%，用于提高水泥的抗压强度，实现42.9 MPa的性能特征。这种特殊的水泥混合物可能用于需要更高抗压强度和耐久性的建筑应用。

mathematicalRelations.modelDescription: A functional unit (FU) is defined as 1 kg of mixed cement with a compressive strength of 42.9 MPa.
功能单位（FU）被定义为具有42.9 MPa抗压强度的1千克混合水泥。

LCIMethodAndAllocation.deviationsFromLCIMethodApproaches: Some data related to the background system were obtained from the Ecoinvent 3.1 database.
与背景系统相关的数据从Ecoinvent 3.1数据库中获得。

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.dataSelectionAndCombinationPrinciples: Inventory data for the Prospect system is collected directly from cement plants located in Changsha, Hunan Province, China.
前景系统的清单数据是直接从位于中国湖南省长沙市的水泥厂收集的。

referenceToDataSource.common:shortDescription: Qinli Zhang, Bingyi Zhang, & Daolin Wang. (2022). Environmental Benefit Assessment of Blended Cement with Modified Granulated Copper Slag. MATERIALS, 15(15).
Qinli Zhang, Bingyi Zhang, & Daolin Wang. (2022). Environmental Benefit Assessment of Blended Cement with Modified Granulated Copper Slag. MATERIALS, 15(15).

dataSourcesTreatmentAndRepresentativenes.useAdviceForDataSet: When integrating this process data into a Life Cycle Assessment (LCA), ensure that the role of MGCS as an SCM is accurately represented in the system boundary. Include the required energy and material inputs for the MGCS preparation, such as the heating to 1550 °C and the nitrogen atmosphere used in the water-quenching process. Transport of raw materials and the final product should also be accounted for. Data should be cross-referenced with the Ecoinvent 3.1 database for background system information. For the assessment of environmental impact, pay special attention to the energy sources, particularly electricity consumption at the cement plant. Use this data with a clear definition of the functional unit (FU), which in this case is 1 kg of mixed cement with a compressive strength of 42.9 MPa.

将此过程数据整合到生命周期评估（LCA）时，确保在系统边界中准确表示MGCS作为SCM的作用。包括MGCS准备所需的能源和材料投入，如加热至1550°C和水淬过程中使用的氮气氛围。还应考虑原材料和最终产品的运输。数据应与Ecoinvent 3.1数据库中的背景系统信息交叉参考。在评估环境影响时，特别注意能源来源，特别是水泥厂的电力消耗。使用该数据时，应明确定义功能单位（FU），在本例中为具有42.9 MPa抗压强度的1公斤混合水泥。

review.common:reviewDetails: Inventory: The internal review was done by several iteration steps concerning raw data validation, raw data documentation, representativity, completeness and consistency of modelling with regard to ISO 14040 and 14044.
清单： 内部审查通过几个迭代步骤完成，涉及原始数据验证、原始数据记录、代表性、完整性、与 ISO 14040 和 14044 有关的建模的一致性。

publicationAndOwnership.common:licenseType: Free of charge for all users and uses

exchange.generalComment: Electricity. Electricity is generated from thermal power.
电。电力是由热力产生的。
PM. The particle size is not specified. Here we treat it as PM>10.
